page.title: 20Colwell Shopping Centre.
page.content: On{School St.}in the town there is a {new shopping centre}called the{Colwell {Shopping Centre.}It is the newest shopping area in Weymouth.The centre is full of lots of{different shops, food shops to gift shops and clothes shops.Most of the downstairs shops sell food.One sells fish and another sweets.There is a{bakery,}a{toyshop and a{leather goods shop.}There is a shop called{Colwell Antiques.}Most of the shops are{clothes shops.}You can get upstairs by an{escalator}or stairs. My parents run a clothes shop. There is a{cafeteria and a wine bar. There is also a{shoe shop}and a{hair {salon.}So if it is a rainy day you could come into the{Colwell Centre and buy most things you need without getting wet. - Anthea Hansen.
